summary: This module supplies utilities for constructing k2 finite‑state automaton topologies used in automatic speech recognition. It offers functions to generate various graph structures (compact, default, minimal, shared‑blank) and a builder that creates RNNT emission adapters by inserting zero‑weight epsilon arcs and rerouting the blank token, facilitating composition with supervision FSAs.
business_intent: Provide ready‑made graph topologies and emission adapters to streamline the development, training, and inference of ASR models that rely on k2‑based finite‑state representations, improving efficiency and correctness of model supervision.
